recipe_book.name: Recipe1
recipe_book.description: Turkey, spinach and mascarpone  cheese come together as a satisfying filling for soft corn tortillas in this simple recipe. For authentic flair, serve the cheesy taquitos with chunky salsa and fresh guacamole.

recipe_book.name: Recipe2
recipe_book.description: Giada De Laurentiis dresses up mild turkey meat with onion, garlic, parsley and cheese to make rich, moist meatballs.

recipe_book.name: Recipe3
recipe_book.description: Smoked paprika gives the sauce for this stew an exotic edge and deep, woodsy flavor, which partners perfectly with herb-flecked turkey meatballs.
